name: Unrelenting Eye
description: A serpent's eye the size of a melon (and just as moist).

abilities.name: Relentless
abilities.description: Increases slow resistance. This bonus is decreased for every enemy hero within close range. Increases status resistance for each enemy within the same area.
notes: Does not react on Invisible heroes or on heroes in the Fog of War
Treats Creep-Heroes and Illusions as heroes
The status resistance bonus is not capped and can increase further
When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the max slow resistance is increased by 30%

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
